## HttpServiceBase.fetch property

Makes an HTTP request. Defaults to a GET request unless overriden. See [HttpHandler](./kibana-plugin-public.httphandler.md) for options.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fetch: HttpHandler;
```
